mapper.select: select sr.id, sr.name, sr.code, sr.type, sc.name typeName, sr.remark, sr.is_locked, sr.is_deleted, sr.is_default, sr.created_by, sr.created_time, sr.modified_by, sr.modified_time from sys_roles sr left join sys_code sc on sc.is_deleted = 0 and sc.value = sr.type where sr.id = #{id} and sr.is_deleted = 0
